      • update

        public void update(G1Player ship,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacleList,
                   double econScore,
                   double envirmScore,
                   double overallScore,
                   long currentTime)
        draws the game score and the player position, and obstacles on the screen, as well as the scrolling background.
        Parameters:
        ship - G1Player, the Player for the G1
        obstacleList - ArrayList<Obstacle>, the list with the Obstacles
        econScore - double, Econ score which we want to display
        envirmScore - double, Envirm score which we want to display
        overallScore - double, Overall score which we want to display
        currentTime - long, the current Time which we have
